page.title: 03AUCHMOUNTAIN GLEN GREENOCK
page.content: The {Auchmountain Glen}is situated in the Strone area of {Greenock}. The Auchmountain Burn runs through it and there are many waterfalls. In 1887 the {Belville Boys} who were a group of unemployed shipyard workers, cleared and landscaped the land. There were seats to sit on. There were also figureheads, one of which was {Lord Nelson}. Since {1945} however, the Glen has been neglected and has become overgrown. The statues have been broken and the seats vandalised. The Auchmountain Glen depended on { {voluntary help} to keep it in order. More people would use the Glen if it was improved as there is no traffic and it is quite safe. People like to go there for walks, sunbathing and for rest.
